thread.section_title: Albergo del Senato - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: The best of Rome
thread.title_full: The best of Rome - Review of Albergo del Senato, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Huib B
title: The best of Rome
text:
The hotel Albergo de Senato is an excellent choice. It is a top hotel located in the very centre of the city of Rome. From the hotel one can explore Rome by foot, the Vatican, Villa Borghese, Forum Romanum, just name it, you have all these places in walking distance. Albergo the Senato is an oasis once you are in the hotel. It is quiet and pleasant. Rooms are perfect, clean and well equipped. Try to get a room with a view of Piazza della Rontonda. From your room you can see the Pantheon. Last bust not least, te staff at the Albergo de Senato is excellent. Friendly hosts that make you feel very welcome.
Room Tip: Ask for a room with a view of Piazza della Rotonda See more room tips
